INSTRUCTIONS: Add these translations to messages/en.json, messages/nl.json, and messages/zh.json

dashboard.credits.templates.title: Custom Export Templates
dashboard.credits.templates.description: Create reusable templates for VAT declarations, accounting, and more

dashboard.templates.pageDescription: Manage your custom export templates for receipts
dashboard.templates.title: Export Templates
dashboard.templates.description: Create custom templates to export receipts in your preferred format

quota.title: Template Quota
quota.remaining: {count, plural, =0 {No templates remaining} one {1 template remaining} other {{count} templates remaining}}
quota.limitReached: You've reached the maximum number of templates. Delete unused templates to create new ones.

dashboard.templates.noTemplatesDescription: Create your first template to export receipts in custom formats like VAT declarations

info.title: How Custom Templates Work
info.point1: Pay {credits} credits once to create a template
info.point3: Perfect for VAT declarations and accounting
info.point4: Map receipt fields to your template columns

deleteDialog.title: Delete Template?
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
deleteDialog.warning: Note: No credits will be refunded for deleted templates.

uploadDialog.title: Create Export Template
uploadDialog.description: Upload your Excel template and configure field mapping
uploadDialog.uploadHint: Upload your VAT declaration form, accounting template, or any Excel file you want to populate with receipt data

placeholders.name: e.g., VAT Declaration Q4 2025
placeholders.description: e.g., Quarterly VAT report for Netherlands

uploadDialog.mappingHint: Enter the column letter (A, B, C, etc.) for each field you want to include

confirm.title: Confirm Template Creation
confirm.insufficientCredits: Insufficient credits. Please purchase more credits.

errors.mappingRequired: At least one field mapping is required

dashboard.credits.templates.title: Aangepaste Export Sjablonen
dashboard.credits.templates.description: Maak herbruikbare sjablonen voor BTW-aangiften, boekhouding en meer

dashboard.templates.pageDescription: Beheer uw aangepaste export sjablonen voor bonnen
dashboard.templates.title: Export Sjablonen
dashboard.templates.description: Maak aangepaste sjablonen om bonnen te exporteren in uw gewenste formaat

quota.title: Sjabloon Quotum
quota.remaining: {count, plural, =0 {Geen sjablonen over} one {1 sjabloon over} other {{count} sjablonen over}}
quota.limitReached: U heeft het maximum aantal sjablonen bereikt. Verwijder ongebruikte sjablonen om nieuwe te maken.

dashboard.templates.noTemplatesDescription: Maak uw eerste sjabloon om bonnen te exporteren in aangepaste formaten zoals BTW-aangiften

info.title: Hoe Aangepaste Sjablonen Werken
info.point1: Betaal {credits} credits één keer om een sjabloon te maken
info.point4: Wijs bonvelden toe aan uw sjabloonkolommen

deleteDialog.title: Sjabloon Verwijderen?
deleteDialog.description: Weet u zeker dat u "{name}" wilt verwijderen? Deze actie kan niet ongedaan worden gemaakt.
deleteDialog.warning: Let op: Er worden geen credits terugbetaald voor verwijderde sjablonen.

uploadDialog.title: Export Sjabloon Maken
uploadDialog.description: Upload uw Excel-sjabloon en configureer veldtoewijzing
uploadDialog.uploadHint: Upload uw BTW-aangifteformulier, boekhoudsjabloon of elk Excel-bestand dat u wilt vullen met bongegevens
uploadDialog.mappingHint: Voer de kolomletter (A, B, C, enz.) in voor elk veld dat u wilt opnemen
uploadDialog.saveSuccess: {credits} credits in rekening gebracht. Sjabloon gemaakt!

dashboard.credits.templates.title: 自定义导出模板
dashboard.credits.templates.description: 创建可重复使用的模板用于增值税申报、会计等
dashboard.credits.templates.useCase1: 增值税申报和税务报告

dashboard.templates.pageDescription: 管理您的自定义收据导出模板
dashboard.templates.title: 导出模板
dashboard.templates.description: 创建自定义模板以您喜欢的格式导出收据

quota.title: 模板配额
quota.remaining: {count, plural, =0 {没有剩余模板} other {剩余 {count} 个模板}}
quota.limitReached: 您已达到最大模板数量。删除未使用的模板以创建新模板。

dashboard.templates.noTemplatesDescription: 创建您的第一个模板以自定义格式（如增值税申报）导出收据

info.title: 自定义模板如何工作
info.point1: 支付 {credits} 积分一次即可创建模板
info.point3: 非常适合增值税申报和会计
info.point4: 将收据字段映射到您的模板列

deleteDialog.title: 删除模板？
deleteDialog.description: 您确定要删除 "{name}" 吗？此操作无法撤销。
deleteDialog.warning: 注意：删除的模板不会退还积分。

uploadDialog.title: 创建导出模板
uploadDialog.description: 上传您的 Excel 模板并配置字段映射
uploadDialog.uploadHint: 上传您的增值税申报表、会计模板或任何您想用收据数据填充的 Excel 文件

placeholders.name: 例如，2025年第四季度增值税申报
placeholders.description: 例如，荷兰季度增值税报告

uploadDialog.mappingHint: 为您想要包含的每个字段输入列字母（A、B、C 等）

confirm.title: 确认创建模板
confirm.insufficientCredits: 积分不足。请购买更多积分。
confirm.benefit1: 使用此模板无限次免费导出
confirm.benefit2: 自动填充您的 Excel 表格

errors.mappingRequired: 至少需要一个字段映射

uploadDialog.saveSuccess: 已扣除 {credits} 积分。模板已创建！
